title: Kenny Aronoff - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/6/20
itunes:title: Kenny Aronoff - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/6/20
description:
George Noory and world famous drummer Kenny Aronoff explore his long career working with rock stars like John Mellencamp, how he sets up his equipment for his unique musical style, and shares a story when he was nearly arrested after a concert.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
